Measure: Hospital-Level Risk-Standardized Complication Rate (RSCR) Following Elective Primary Total Hip Arthroplasty (THA) and/or Total Knee Arthroplasty (TKA)
Applicable Episodes: Major joint replacement of the lower extremity (MJRLE)

Measure: Excess Days in Acute Care after Hospitalization for Acute Myocardial Infarction (AMI)
Perioperative Care: Selection of Prophylactic Antibiotic: First or Second Generation Cephalosporin
Applicable Episodes: Major joint replacement of the lower extremity (MJRLE)
